name: Fort Defenders 7 seas HD
description:
All hands on deck! Pirate armada dead ahead!
Take part in an uncompromising struggle repelling freebooters' assaults. Watch out, the enemy may catch the tide for ruining your fortress.

Welcome to the unique pirate style Strategy Game. Now the battle rages on by land and by sea!
Four worlds, 80 levels, unique ships, menacing bosses and powerful spells - all this will deepen you into the game.
